investments.title: Investments
investments.empty: You don't have any active investments.

my_portfolio.wallet_not_activated_notice: Your portfolio will be available after you've invested into a project.

errors.amount_below_min: Investment amount too low. | The minimum investment is {{ amount }}
errors.amount_above_max: Investment amount too high. | The maximum investment is {{ amount }}
errors.amount_above_balance: You don't have enough funds on your wallet.
errors.max_reached: You have already invested a maximum allowed amount for this project.
errors.not_enough_funds: You don't have enough funds for minimal investment.

wallet.title: Wallet

description.notice: You must initialize your wallet to invest.
description.title: Your private, secure wallet
description.details: We're commited to making sure your funds are as safe as they can possibly be when using our platform. To do this, we prevent the management of your money by anyone other than you. | This is why we use a third-party secure wallet to store your money and approve investments into projects. To start the process of initializing your wallet - click on the button below.

wallet.wallet_not_active_notice: Your wallet is pending approval from admin. You can deposit funds while pending approval.
wallet.wallet_empty_notice: Your wallet is empty. Deposit funds to get started.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.notice: After you have deposited the money onto our bank account it can take up to 24h for it to become visible on the platform. You will be notified by email when your money has been received.

pending.notice: You have a pending withdrawal request. | Please approve it to have money deposited into your account. | It can take up to 24 hours to process the transaction.

no_bank.notice: You cannot withdraw money without an active bank account.

tooltip.not_verified: Profile not verified. Go to User Profile screen to finish onboarding process.
tooltip.wallet_not_initialized: In order to manage funds, you need to have your wallet initialized.
tooltip.verification_pending: Please wait for the administrator to verified your wallet.

user_state_reminder.not_verified: Profile not verified. Please go | here | to verify your profile and finish onboarding procedure.
user_state_reminder.initialize_wallet: Thank you for verifying your profile. | In order to manage funds, you need to have your wallet initialized. Please initialize your wallet | here | .
user_state_reminder.activation_pending: Thank you for initializing your wallet.
user_state_reminder.activation_pending.user_notice: Please wait for the administrator to get it verified.
user_state_reminder.activation_pending.admin_notice: Please wait for a few moments to get everything set up.

wallet.withdraw_not_approved: Forbidden action because the withdrawal has not already been approved.
wallet.withdraw_already_burned: Forbidden action because the withdrawal has already been processed.
wallet.wallet_not_activated_by_admin: Forbidden action! Wallet must be activated by administrator.
wallet.missing_revenue_payout: Invalid action. Requested revenue payout transaction is missing.
